history.content:
You would be put on the waitlist if you try to add them in Phase 1.

I think the declaration process isn't completed until end of Phase 2 (and you can't really wait till then, as the classes would most likely fill up completely) so it would be in your benefit to at least waitlist yourself in Phase 1.

You would be put on the waitlist if you try to add them in Phase 1.

I think the declaration process isn't completed until end of Phase 2 (and you can't really wait till then, as the classes would most likely fill up) so it would be in your benefit to at least waitlist yourself in Phase 1.

children.subject: I think declarations are processed over the summer (could be wrong if someone knows for sure please add), if that's the case then I think it should be okay since phase II is relatively late in the summer

history.content: I am taking 61b/70 and will most likely be able to declare this semester. Should I wait until declaration and therefore Phase 2 to take 170 or 188? Or should I try phase 1ing these?
history.subject: Taking upperdiv CS when currently undeclared
